title: Madawa Macrada
text: Madawa Macrada is a <a href="Chad">Chad</a>ian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and the member of <a href="Chad%20national%20football%20team">Chad national football team</a>. He has 2 caps for national team earned in qualifying matches for <a href="2012%20Africa%20Cup%20of%20Nations">2012 Africa Cup of Nations</a>. He plays club football in <a href="Gazelle%20FC">Gazelle FC</a> in <a href="Chad">Chad</a>.
